reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful world-building - get ready to fall in love with Fintan and Cyn
reviews.reviewText: RATING: ⭐⭐⭐⭐.5STEAM: 🔥🔥🔥Hard Drive is the second installment of January Bell's Neon Renegade series. Cyn had given up hope to get out from Nustof's control. After the Impericorps invaded her town, she escaped to Briganed only to be indentured by the Outerspace crime boss. Now she has become a sought-out hacker, but as Nustof slowly but surely loses control, she becomes a liability.Fintan is brought in as a Cymech guard to watch over Cyn, but he is not fully under Nustof's control, either. The two form an alliance and escape.My favorite part about January Bell's books is her wonderful world-building. Not only does she serve an engaging story with very relatable characters, but she also creates a vibrant backdrop to each read. Hard Drive is no different. Fintan and Cyn immediately capture our attention with their chemistry, and the action and suspense keep us turning the pages. Fintan is silent, broody, and protective. He is especially considerate of Cyn's history and boundaries. And Cyn! Bell is two-for-two with strong and formidable heroines as Cyn brings fierceness and determination.I also fell in love with the side characters, especially Tweak, Cyn's quirky AI, and Bear.This can be read as a standalone. Bell does a great job of providing context to Book 1 references. But readers would be remiss to get the full experience if they don't start from the beginning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Enjoyed this revisit to the world set up in book 1.This story is told at a slightly different pace..Its still a lot of fun but less with the adventure and more with the mushy gushy.The heroine is more of a sassy programmer and not so ka. Hero is a fun broody type.There's an awol ai with its own personality..Yeah it's good.I did skim a few to get to the action scenes (in a hilarious reversal) - but this space plot is 100% where my interest is engaged!Fun, cute, romantic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Cyn and FintanA former cymech warrior class, Fintan is a cyborg who has escaped the control of Impericorps, and has gone undercover to try and help Cyn, a human hacker, escape from where she is being held captive.Betrayed by a former boyfriend, Cyn is being held by Nusthof, a crime lord who controls one of the space stations on the outer rim.With the help of Fintan and her cymech war wolf Bear, Cyn is more than ready to fight for her freedom.This is the third story set in the Neon Renegades world, the first being a freebie novella on the author’s website, and it is important to read both of those books first.The novella introduces Fintan, the first book in the series explains why he is looking to help Cyn, and since there is also an overarching story going on, it makes more sense when read in order.Like the other two stories in the series, this one is fast paced, action packed, and full of all sorts of sci-fi stuff; space travel, futuristic setting, futuristic technology, and a scene stealing AI with attitude! Of course there is also romance, and even though it is part of a series, it is a standalone romance- with an HEA.A thoroughly entertaining space-themed sci-fi romance, recommended for fans of the genre.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an incredible series
reviews.reviewText: I read the first book and what's so excited by it. I'll quickly. Bought the other two books. ABCD read alone. That I was so fascinated by the story everything stopped till I finish the third one a wonderful book that I would highly recommend to everyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just binge read your whole catalog on Kindle. You are a great writer. Your plots make sense and your characters feel like real people. I can't wait for the next book, so write it quick!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet romance between a skilled hacker woman and a Cymech warrior
reviews.reviewText: Cyn has been kept as a slave for her hacker skills by a gangster man on a space station, and unbeknownst to her, a Cymech is sent to rescue her.I advise reading the previous book (or bundle with the extra novellas). This one leans more on the romantic side than the previous book did, but I like the sweet romance between the two characters more. Fintan is more of a cinnamon roll than Riker (lead from previous book).I read this as part of the Rogue Cymech Warriors book bundle, so it was nice to have all the stories flow together. I really loved the epilogue that let us see the HEA for all the characters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ..."like she can read the broken code running through my brain."
reviews.reviewText: Fintan was asked to pretend he wasn't free, hadn't evolved, was still mentally caged by Impericorps at the end of the previous book, and go undercover to get Cyn off the space station she's trapped on.Cyn doesn't know who she can trust, perhaps in part because of past betrayals. What she does know is she's got to get out... and something about today feels increasingly off... leading her to fear she's running out of time.This done in one Kindle Unlimited quick read has fun characters on a journey to freedom. I adored Tweak and Bear, and loved the ongoing theme of good people doing what they had to in order to survive, striving to remain good people even in bad situations, and taking on the guilt for things bad people forced them to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neon Renegades Books 1 & 2
reviews.reviewText: Some of the most emotional rewarding books I've read in the many ,many books I've had access to . VERY WELL thought out story lines tying both books together seemlessly . Thank You January Bell for writing such endearing and exciting books . These are keepers ‼️ 👍

A well written book that I know I will read again and again. Cyn and Fintan have depth; regrets and hope. In a short period of time they have to take a leap and choose to trust each other. Twists and turns, quirky characters and humour are part of what make this book worth the time spent reading it.
